price: 78.Usuk Yalla kinni aytiitaa kee intiitaay sorkocobaxitte siinih gintem, isin aniqmatal Yalla faatittaanam siinik dagoh.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī ansha-a lakumu al-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata qalīlan mā tashkurūna
